detail_desc: Relaxed-fit T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, rib-trimmed neckline and gently dropped shoulders.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wide foldover panel at the waist and cuffed hems.
Metal hoop earrings.
Metal hoop earrings.
A pair of metal earrings.
Top in a soft rib knit with a flounce around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Top in a soft rib knit with a flounce around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Three-strand necklace of metal chains in various designs, the longest with a coin-shaped pendant and the shorter chains decorated with small metal pendants and plastic beads. Adjustable length.
Blouse in softly draping satin with a pleated stand-up collar and a small opening and buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with pleated, buttoned cuffs.
Blouse in softly draping satin with a pleated stand-up collar and a small opening and buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with pleated, buttoned cuffs.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace. One of the chains is decorated with spherical pendants and the other has a round pendant. Adjustable length.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace. One of the chains is decorated with spherical pendants and the other has a round pendant. Adjustable length.
Metal studs and earrings in various designs and sizes.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Short A-line dress in a cotton weave with gathered seams on the skirt. Square neckline front and back and short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems. Unlined.
Metal rings in various designs. Size adjustable.
Stylish ballet pumps with a V-shaped opening and pointed toes. Imitation leather linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 1 cm.
Stylish ballet pumps with a V-shaped opening and pointed toes. Imitation leather linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 1 cm.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication at the back, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Pleats at the front, shaping darts at the back, diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and legs with creases.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication at the back, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Pleats at the front, shaping darts at the back, diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and legs with creases.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication at the back, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Pleats at the front, shaping darts at the back, diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and legs with creases.

Short dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, and a rounded hem.

Short dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulder seams, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Oversized jacket in cotton denim with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Boxy-style, cable-knit polo-neck jumper in soft, warming yak wool with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit wool and recycled cashmere blend. V-neck, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with turn-ups at the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline, down the button band and at the cuffs and hem.

Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit wool and recycled cashmere blend. V-neck, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with turn-ups at the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline, down the button band and at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in soft, rib-knit merino wool with a round neckline and long trumpet sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with a drawstring hood and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

Straight-cut tops in cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline, a print motif and long sleeves.

Knee-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Unlined.

Dress in glossy jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and a print motif on the front. Seam at the waist and a lined tulle skirt with multiple asymmetric tiers and a glittery top layer.
Top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves. Close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs, and ribbing at the hem. Brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatshirt is recycled.

Long-sleeved dress in heavy jersey. V-shaped yoke at the front with a flounced trim that continues around the dropped shoulders. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Straight-style top in jersey crêpe with pleats on the shoulders and elbow-length puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems.

Joggers in a soft knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. The polyester content of the joggers is partly recycled.

Crop top in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and wide ribbing at the hem. The polyamide content of the top is partly recycled. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
